# path()

**Instance Method**

Returns a string representing the browser’s current path.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func path() -> String
```

## Return Value

The path representing the current selection. The components of this path are separated with the string returned by [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBrowser/pathSeparator].

## Discussion

Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSBrowser/path(toColumn:)] for all columns.

## Managing the Path

- **setPath(_:)**: Sets the path to be displayed by the browser.
- **path(toColumn:)**: Returns a string representing the path from the first column up to, but not including, the column at the given index.
- **pathSeparator**: The path separator.
